entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h except west 40 gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait. Wind becoming light overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of drizzle. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind light except east 30 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait late in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the evening and after midnight. Wind light except east 40 km/h near Juan de Fuca Strait overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 31 December 2022
